name: Low-Carb Cream Cheese Pancakes
author: Anson Loomis
summary: Started a low-carb diet and heard about these pancakes. Found a recipe, made them, and enjoyed them. Really great when you want something sweet and low-carb. Top with your favorite pancake toppings and enjoy.
directions: Combine eggs, cream cheese, stevia, and cinnamon in a blender; blend until smooth
Let batter sit until bubbles settle, about 2 minutes
Heat a large skillet over medium heat
Pour 1/4 of the batter onto the skillet; cook until golden brown, about 2 minutes
Flip and continue cooking until second side is golden brown, about 1 minute more
